text: Tumhi sanga ki to kona ahe, jo tumhala akasa va jaminituna roji (annasamugri) pohacavito kinva to kona ahe jo kananvara ani dolyanvara purna adhikara rakhato ani to kona ahe jo nirjivatuna sajiva bahera kadhato, ani nirjivala sajivatuna bahera kadhato ani to kona ahe jo samasta karyance vyavasthapana rakhato. Nihsansaya te heca mhanatila ki allaha! Tevha tyanna sanga ki, maga tumhi bhaya ka rakhata nahi
